channel.title: [317] Change were player goes after death
channel.description: I want to change were the player is revived when he dies.

item.title: [317] Change were player goes after death
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

ytuio9:

if it doesn’t teleport you then you probably remove the co-ords entirely…

THANKS MAN! WHEN I GET 15 REP IL REP YOU!

item.source: [317] Change were player goes after death

item.title: [317] Change were player goes after death
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:4, topic:329800”]well obviously… and to change where you START OUT, you go to player.java and do the same. but anyways since we’re here for the death, you’re going to die, and type in ::mypos. then get the co-ords.

e.g:

ytuio3: ::mypos
mypos: absX = 1234, absY = 5678

so in client.java you’ll search for 1234. make sure it’s something like:

toX = 1234;
toY = 5678;

then edit it as much as you want remember some sources have the deathstage thingy repeated a few times, so i guess you’ll have to re-edit them (mine, i had to add this 3 times lol)[/quote]
I have no idea what just happened but whenever I die. It says “Oh dear! Your dead” and then my hp restarts to 99.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Change were player goes after death

item.title: [317] Change were player goes after death
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

well obviously… and to change where you START OUT, you go to player.java and do the same. but anyways since we’re here for the death, you’re going to die, and type in ::mypos. then get the co-ords.

e.g:

ytuio3: ::mypos
mypos: absX = 1234, absY = 5678

so in client.java you’ll search for 1234. make sure it’s something like:

toX = 1234;
toY = 5678;

then edit it as much as you want remember some sources have the deathstage thingy repeated a few times, so i guess you’ll have to re-edit them (mine, i had to add this 3 times lol)

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Change were player goes after death
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“kingdomkey01, post:2, topic:329800”]I’m going to assume you use Delta base? _.

Well try to edit your deathstages,

To easily find out where your death coordinates lie, die somehow on your server, then type ::mypos, and then search up the coordinates of where you die.[/quote]
Is this on client.java? I’m using empire scape source.

Read full topic
